contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} [[File:Map Satosho en,.png|thumb|Location of Asakuchi District in Okayama Prefecture]] {{Nihongo|'''Asakuchi'''|浅口郡|Asakuchi-gun}} is a [[districts of Japan|district]] located in [[Okayama Prefecture|Okayama]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the district has an estimated [[population]] of 55,658 and a [[population density|density]] of 621.67 persons per km². The total area is 89.53 km². ==Towns and villages== *[[Satoshō, Okayama|Satoshō]] ==Merger== *On August 1, 2005 the town of [[Funao, Okayama|Funao]] became part of the city of [[Kurashiki, Okayama|Kurashiki]]. *On March 21, 2006 the towns of [[Kamogata, Okayama|Kamogata]], [[Konkō, Okayama|Konkō]] and [[Yorishima, Okayama|Yorishima]] merged to form the city of [[Asakuchi, Okayama|Asakuchi]]. Therefore, this leaves [[Satosho, Okayama|Satoshō]] the only member of a "rump" Asakuchi-Gun. {{Okayama}} {{coord|34.514333|N|133.556094|E|type:landmark_source:itwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Districts in Okayama Prefecture]] {{Okayama-geo-stub}}
